name: Snowtime Delivery
description:
Snowtime Delivery is a retro-inspired, 2D Platformer.
Jump, run, be a snowman and have fun!

The game provides 9 levels of increasing difficulty.

You can follow me on Twitter ongamex92 for updates and other new games!
Oh, please, share the game ^_^

The game might ask you to install .NET Core. Currently it is ~50MB.
The messy source(C# with MonoGame) code is available on github
